MODAL.LOGIN_SIGNUP_TITLE: To get your promocode, please log in or create a MoneyOwl account.

COMPREHENSIVE.GET_STARTED: A step-by-step guide to help you plan your finances!

COMPREHENSIVE.PHOLOSOPHY_DESC_SUB: your money will be used to first fund children education and later support your retirement. Let's see how it turns out
COMPREHENSIVE.RESULT_SUB_TITLE: At the end of the session ,you will get:
COMPREHENSIVE.RESULTS_FIRST: Fun and interactive result that enables you to design your strategy to reach goals
COMPREHENSIVE.RESULTS_SECOND: You can also sign up for our advisory services to get additional help

COMPREHENSIVE_STEPS.STEP_1_DESC: Your family commitments will impact on your financial Planning.Lets list it out now!
COMPREHENSIVE_STEPS.STEP_2_DESC: The information help us to estimate what you can save and invest, your protection need and your financial health.
COMPREHENSIVE_STEPS.STEP_3_DESC: Let's find out how protected you are in face unexpected events
COMPREHENSIVE_STEPS.STEP_4_DESC: Tell us when you wish to retire and we will examine how you could reach this goal during your advisory session
